question: Which country has become the first Asian country to recognize same sex marriage?
explanation: Taiwan has become the first Asian country to recognize same sex marriage after the constitutional courtâ€™s ruling comes in support of legalizing same-sex marriage. It must be noted that South Africa is the only country in Africa to permit same-sex marriage.
